author: kfogel
msg: handling of line 24.  Tweak handling of 37 to match above.

author: sussman
msg: Rewrite of EOL logic for checkouts & updates.  Mmmm, much better.
(change_file_prop): make sure file baton caches any eol-style change
(close_file): New merging logic: determine latest, greatest value of
eol-style at the beginning.  Then, if merging is necessary,
unconditionally generate a LF patchfile by running diff on LF-copies
of both old and new textbases.  If eol-style is turned off, just
apply the patchfile directly to the working file.  Otherwise, apply
the patchfile to an LF-copy of the working file, and then copy it
back (with appropriate translation) on top of the working file.

author: cmpilato
msg: Added *.src and *.dst to the svn:ignore property.
